00041 #define wxMENUCMD_TYPE                                0x1234

00046 class wxMenuCmd : public wxCmd
00047 {
00049       wxMenuItem *m_pItem;
00050 
00051 public:           // static
00052 
00054       static wxMenuBar *m_pMenuBar;
00055 
00058       static void SetMenuBar(wxMenuBar *p)
00059             { m_pMenuBar = p; }
00060 
00063       static void Register(wxMenuBar *p)
00064             { wxCmd::AddCmdType(wxMENUCMD_TYPE, wxMenuCmd::CreateNew); 
00065                   wxMenuCmd::SetMenuBar(p); }
00066 
00069       static wxCmd *CreateNew(int id);
00070 
00071 public:
00072 
00073       wxMenuCmd(wxMenuItem *p, 
00074             const wxKeyBind &first, 
00075             const wxString &name = wxEmptyString,
00076             const wxString &desc = wxEmptyString) :
00077              wxCmd(first, p->GetId(), name, desc), m_pItem(p) {}
00078 
00079       wxMenuCmd(wxMenuItem *p = NULL, 
00080             const wxString &name = wxEmptyString,
00081             const wxString &desc = wxEmptyString) {
00082             m_pItem = p;
00083             m_strDescription = desc;
00084             m_strName = name;
00085 
00086             if (m_pItem)
00087                   m_nId = m_pItem->GetId();
00088       }
00089 
00090       virtual ~wxMenuCmd() {}
00091 
00092 public:
00093 
00094       virtual void DeepCopy(const wxCmd *p) {
00095             wxMenuCmd *m = (wxMenuCmd *)p;
00096             m_pItem = m->m_pItem;
00097             wxCmd::DeepCopy(p);
00098       }
00099 
00100       virtual wxCmd *Clone() const {
00101             wxCmd *ret = new wxMenuCmd();
00102             ret->DeepCopy(this);
00103             return ret;
00104       }
00105 
00106       virtual int GetType() const {
00107             return wxMENUCMD_TYPE;
00108       }
00109 
00110 
00111 
00112 protected:
00113 
00116       void Exec(wxObject *origin, wxEvtHandler *client);
00117 
00124       void Update();
00125 };

00331             m_pArr = arr;
00332             Walk(p, NULL);
